name: Tom Collins
description: A classic gin cocktail dating back to the 1870s, combining gin, fresh lemon juice, sugar, and carbonated water. Named after a widespread hoax that swept New York in 1874 known as 'The Great Tom Collins Hoax'.

attributes.value: Gin, Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Soda Water
Combine 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, and 0.5 oz simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Top with soda water and stir gently
